# RealityViewContent.Body

**Structure**

The default view contents of a reality view, using reality view content.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency struct Body<Placeholder> where Placeholder : View
```

## Overview

You don’t create this type directly. [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/RealityView] creates values for you.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- View
